mapper.select: SELECT specialcar_id AS specialCarId, car_license AS carLicense, restrict_type AS restrictType, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, remarks FROM park_specialcar WHERE special_type = #{specialType} AND del_flag = 0 AND status = #{status} AND parkinglot_id = #{parkingLotId} AND CONCAT (IFNULL(car_license,''),IFNULL(remarks,'')) LIKE '%${carLicense}%' LIMIT #{startRow},#{pageSize};

SELECT COUNT(specialcar_id) FROM park_specialcar WHERE parkinglot_id = #{parkingLotId} AND special_type = #{specialType}AND del_flag = 0 AND status = #{status} AND CONCAT (IFNULL(car_license,''),IFNULL(remarks,'')) LIKE '%${carLicense}%';
mapper.update: UPDATE park_specialcar SET del_flag =1, update_by = #{uid}, update_date = sysdate() WHERE specialcar_id = #{specialCarId};

UPDATE park_specialcar SET car_license = #{carLicense}, restrict_type = #{restrictType}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{uid}, update_date = sysdate() WHERE specialcar_id = #{specialCarId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO park_specialcar( specialcar_id, brand_id, estate_id, agent_id, parkinglot_id, special_type, car_license, restrict_type, start_date, end_date, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, status, del_flag) VALUES ( #{specialCarId}, #{brandId}, #{estateId}, #{agentId}, #{parkinglotId}, #{specialType}, #{carLicense}, #{restrictType}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{uid}, sysdate(), #{uid}, sysdate(), #{remarks}, 1, 0 );
